id,

update user

password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

opt_date = #{optDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expire_date = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
